sentences: The Secretariat introduced three sub-items under this agenda item on the CGE (FCCC/SBI/2010/21 and Add.1); further implementation of Convention Article 12.5; and financial and technical support.
The CGE Chair described progress made in implementing the CGE work programme.
The GEF presented on the status of financial and technical support for non-Annex I national communications (FCCC/SBI/2010/INF.10, FCCC/CP/2010/5 and Add.1).
Anke Herold (Germany) and Eric Mugurusi (Tanzania) will co-chair a contact group on these issues.
